at0000.1.description: A generic section header which should be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.
Un encabezado de sección de tipo genérico que será renombrado en una plantilla para su empleo en un contexto clínico específico.
En generisk seksjonsoverskrift som skal gis nytt navn i en templat for å passe i en gitt klinisk kontekst.
Um cabeçalho de sessão genérico que deve ser renomeado no template para adequar-se a um contexto clínico específico.
En allmän avsnittsrubrik som döps om i en openEHR-mall för att passa in i en specifik klinisk kontext.
Eine generische Abschnittsüberschrift eines Templates, welche entsprechend dem spezifischen klinischen Kontext umbenannt werden sollte.
Un'intestazione di sezione generica che dovrebbe essere rinominata in un template per adattarsi ad uno specifico contesto clinico.
Un en-tête de section générique qui doit être renommé dans un modèle pour s'adapter à un contexte clinique spécifique.

de.purpose: *To create a framework for recording answers about problems or diagnoses, to the questions of a pre-defined screening questionnaire. (en)
de.use:
*Use to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation, for example:
--- Diagnosed with cancer? Yes, No, Unknown.
--- Diagnosed with COVID 19 or Influenza in the past twelve months? Yes, No, Unknown.
- Specific questioning related to disease surveillance.

The semantics of this archetype are intentionally loose, and querying this archetype would normally only be useful or safe within the context of each specific template. In a template, each data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. Where value sets have been proposed for common use cases, these can be adapted for local use by using the 'text' choice to match each specific use case.

In use cases where it's important to differentiate the time context of a question in the persisted data, the reference model EVENT structure can be used to record this difference. For questions specifically about the point in time of recording, use a point in time EVENT, for example "Do you have influenza?". In contrast, for questions specifically about a period of time, use the interval event, for example, "Have you had influenza in the past 4 weeks?".

The source of the information in a questionnaire response may vary in different contexts but can be specifically identified using the 'Information provider' element in the Reference Model.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening questionnaire identifies the presence of a problem or diagnosis, it is recommended that clinical system record and persist the specific details about the problem or diagnosis (such as the date of clinical recognition) using the EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis archetype. (en)
de.misuse:
*Not to be used to record details about the presence or absence of a problem or diagnosis, outside of a screening context. Use EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis or EVALUATION.exclusion_specific for these purposes.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about issues, worries or concerns affecting an individual. Use OBSERVATION.issue_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about procedures performed. Use the OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about adverse reactions, use OBESERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for this purpose. (en)

nb.purpose: For å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om problemer eller diagnoser.
nb.use:
Brukes for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om problemer eller diagnoser.

Vanlige bruksområder inkluderer, men er ikke begrenset til:
- Systematiske spørsmål ved konsultasjoner, for eksempel:
--- Diagnostisert med kreft? Ja, Nei, Ukjent.
--- Diagnostisert med Covid 19 eller influensa de siste tolv månedene? Ja, Nei, Ukjent.
- Spesifikke spørsmål relatert til overvåkning av sykdommer.

Semantikken til denne arketypen er med vilje løst definert, og spørringer etter data i denne arketypen vil normalt bare være nyttig eller trygt innenfor konteksten av hvert spesifikke templat. I et templat vil hvert dataelement vanligvis døpes om til det spesifikke spørsmålet. Der det er foreslått verdisett for vanlige brukstilfeller, kan disse tilpasses for lokal bruk ved å bruke 'tekst'-datatypen for å matche hvert enkelt brukstilfelle.

I tilfeller der det er viktig å skille tid i konteksten av spørsmål i de persisterte dataene, kan referansemodellens EVENT-struktur brukes for å registrere denne variasjonen. For spørsmål som spesifikt handler om tidspunktet ved registrering, bruk tidspunkt (point in time) EVENT. For eksempel: "Har du influensa?". Spørsmål som spesifikt omhandler en tidsperiode, bruk et intervall (interval) EVENT. For eksempel: "Har du hatt influensa de siste 4 ukene?".

Kilden til informasjonen i et spørreskjema kan variere i ulike kontekster, men kan identifiseres spesifikt ved å benytte "Information provider" elementet i openEHR referansemodellen.

Denne arketypen er laget for å bli brukt i et spørreskjema eller for å registrere enkle strukturerte data til for eksempel et sykdomsregister. Dersom det i spørreskjemaet identifiseres at et problem eller en diagnose er tilstede, anbefales det at det at spesifikke detaljer om problemet eller diagnosen (som for eksempel dato for klinisk bekreftelse) registreres og lagres i pasientjournalen i arketypen Problem/diagnose (EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis).
nb.misuse:
Brukes ikke for å registrere detaljer om tilstedeværelse eller fravær av et problem eller en diagnose utenfor konteksten av kartleggingen. Bruk arketypen EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis eller EVALUATION.exclusion_specific for dette formålet.

Brukes ikke for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om bekymringer eller forhold som gjelder et individ. Bruk arketypen OBSERVATION.issue_screening for dette formålet.

Brukes ikke for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om gjennomførte prosedyrer, bruk arketypen OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for dette formålet.

Brukes ikke for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om overfølsomhetsreaksjoner, bruk arketypen OBSERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for dette formålet.

en.purpose: To create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.
en.use:
Use to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation, for example:
--- Diagnosed with cancer? Yes, No, Unknown.
--- Diagnosed with COVID 19 or Influenza in the past twelve months? Yes, No, Unknown.
- Specific questioning related to disease surveillance.

The semantics of this archetype are intentionally loose, and querying this archetype would normally only be useful or safe within the context of each specific template. In a template, each data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. Where value sets have been proposed for common use cases, these can be adapted for local use by using the 'text' choice to match each specific use case.

In use cases where it's important to differentiate the time context of a question in the persisted data, the reference model EVENT structure can be used to record this difference. For questions specifically about the point in time of recording, use a point in time EVENT, for example "Do you have influenza?". In contrast, for questions specifically about a period of time, use the interval event, for example, "Have you had influenza in the past 4 weeks?".

The source of the information in a questionnaire response may vary in different contexts but can be specifically identified using the 'Information provider' element in the Reference Model.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening questionnaire identifies the presence of a problem or diagnosis, it is recommended that clinical system record and persist the specific details about the problem or diagnosis (such as the date of clinical recognition) using the EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis archetype.
en.misuse:
Not to be used to record details about the presence or absence of a problem or diagnosis, outside of a screening context. Use EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis or EVALUATION.exclusion_specific for these purposes.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about issues, worries or concerns affecting an individual. Use OBSERVATION.issue_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about procedures performed. Use the OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about adverse reactions, use OBSERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for this purpose.

at0000.1.description: Answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

at0028.1.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.2.text: Penderita diabetes dengan kadar gula darah dan tekanan darah yang tinggi lebih berisiko terkena gangguan pengelihatan
at0028.2.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.3.text: Pada fase awal gangguan penglihatan ini seringkali tidak menimbulkan gejala oleh karena itu pemeriksaan mata rutin perlu dilakukan untuk mendeteksi gangguan pengelihatan
at0028.3.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.4.text: Pada fase lebih lanjut gangguan penglihatan ini ditandai oleh penglihatan yang kabur dan kesulitan untuk memfokuskan penglihatan
at0028.4.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.5.text: Mata terasa nyeri merupakan salah satu gejala gangguan mata akibat diabetes
at0028.5.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.6.text: Penderita diabetes disarankan untuk periksa mata paling tidak satu tahun sekali
at0028.6.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.7.text: Penderita diabetes yang tidak merasakan gangguan penglihatan tidak perlu diperiksa mata
at0028.7.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.8.text: Pemeriksaan dan pengobatan mata secara dini merupakan kunci utama dalam menjaga fungsi pengelihatan
at0028.8.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.9.text: Kadar gula darah dapat dikontrol dengan melakukan diet teratur, aktivitas fisik (olah raga), serta penggunaan insulin atau obat
at0028.9.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.10.text: Kontrol gula darah yang baik dapat mencegah gangguan pengelihatan akibat diabetes karena tingginya kadar gula darah merupakan penybebab gangguan pengelihatan
at0028.10.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.11.text: Mengurangi asupan lemak pada penderita diabetes perlu dilakukan untuk mencegah gangguan pengelihatan akibat diabetes
at0028.11.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.12.text: Tekanan darah penderita diabetes tidak berpengaruh terhadap terjadinya gangguan pengelihatan akibat diabetes
at0028.12.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.13.text: Pemeriksaan mata yang disarankan semenjak menderita diabetes adalah paling tidak satu tahun sekali
at0028.13.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.14.text: Penderita diabetes hanya memeriksakan mata mereka apabila dirujuk oleh dokter
at0028.14.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

de.purpose: *To create a framework for recording answers about problems or diagnoses, to the questions of a pre-defined screening questionnaire. (en)
de.use:
*Use to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation, for example:
--- Diagnosed with cancer? Yes, No, Unknown.
--- Diagnosed with COVID 19 or Influenza in the past twelve months? Yes, No, Unknown.

Where value sets have been proposed for common use cases, these can be adapted for local use by using the 'text' choice to match each specific use case.

In use cases where it's important to differentiate the time context of a question in the persisted data, the reference model EVENT structure can be used to record this difference. For questions specifically about the point in time of recording, use a point in time EVENT, for example "Do you have influenza?". In contrast, for questions specifically about a period of time, use the interval event, for example, "Have you had influenza in the past 4 weeks?".

The source of the information in a questionnaire response may vary in different contexts but can be specifically identified using the 'Information provider' element in the Reference Model.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about issues, worries or concerns affecting an individual. Use OBSERVATION.issue_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about procedures performed. Use the OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about adverse reactions, use OBESERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for this purpose. (en)

nb.purpose: For å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om problemer eller diagnoser.
nb.use:
Brukes for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om problemer eller diagnoser.

Vanlige bruksområder inkluderer, men er ikke begrenset til:
- Systematiske spørsmål ved konsultasjoner, for eksempel:

--- Diagnostisert med Covid 19 eller influensa de siste tolv månedene? Ja, Nei, Ukjent.

Semantikken til denne arketypen er med vilje løst definert, og spørringer etter data i denne arketypen vil normalt bare være nyttig eller trygt innenfor konteksten av hvert spesifikke templat. Der det er foreslått verdisett for vanlige brukstilfeller, kan disse tilpasses for lokal bruk ved å bruke 'tekst'-datatypen for å matche hvert enkelt brukstilfelle.

I tilfeller der det er viktig å skille tid i konteksten av spørsmål i de persisterte dataene, kan referansemodellens EVENT-struktur brukes for å registrere denne variasjonen. Spørsmål som spesifikt omhandler en tidsperiode, bruk et intervall (interval) EVENT. For eksempel: "Har du hatt influensa de siste 4 ukene?".

*Not to be used to record details about the presence or absence of a problem or diagnosis, outside of a screening context. Use EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis or EVALUATION.exclusion_specific for these purposes.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about issues, worries or concerns affecting an individual. Use OBSERVATION.issue_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about procedures performed. Use the OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about adverse reactions, use OBESERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for this purpose. (en)

at0000.1.description: Answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

at0028.1.text: Jika pengelihatan saya baik, saya tidak perlu periksa mata
at0028.1.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.2.text: Saya merasa penderita diabetes sering membuang waktu & uang mereka untuk periksa mata karena sebenarnya pengelihatan mereka itu baik
at0028.2.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.3.text: Saya merasa waktu & biaya yang dikeluarkan untuk periksa mata merupakan hal yang wajar demi menjaga kesehatan
at0028.3.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.4.text: Sebagai seorang penderita diabetes, saya akan melakukan pemeriksaan mata paling tidak 1 tahun sekali untuk mendeteksi gangguan pengelihatan
at0028.4.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.5.text: Walaupun pemeriksaan mata membutuhkan biaya tambahan, saya akan tetap melakukannya karena itu penting
at0028.5.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.6.text: Sebagai seorang penderita diabetes saya tahu pentingnya diet teratur, olah raga, penggunaan insulin, dan konsumsi obat untuk mengontrol gula darrah saya
at0028.6.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.7.text: Mengontrol gula darah dalam batas normal dapat mencegah dan menunda perburukan gangguan mata
at0028.7.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.8.text: Saya merasa mengontrol kadar gula darah merupakan hal yang sia-sia karena pada umumnya kadar gula darah penderita diabetes akan selalu tinggi
at0028.8.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.9.text: Sebagai seorang penderita diabetes saya akan mengontrol kadar gula darah saya agar tidak ada komplikasi yang ditimbulkan
at0028.9.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.10.text: Untuk mencegah terjadinya gangguan mata, saya pun akan menjaga tekanan darah saya dalam batas normal
at0028.10.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.11.text: Walaupun saya harus berusaha keras dalam menjaga kadar lemak tetap dalam batas normal, saya akan tetap melakukannya karena itu penting
at0028.11.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

author.name: Marit Alice Venheim, Silje Ljosland Bakke, John Tore Valand
author.organisation: Helse Vest IKT, Helse Vest IKT AS, Helse Bergen

de.purpose: *To create a framework for recording answers about problems or diagnoses, to the questions of a pre-defined screening questionnaire. (en)
de.use:
*Use to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation, for example:
--- Diagnosed with cancer? Yes, No, Unknown.
--- Diagnosed with COVID 19 or Influenza in the past twelve months? Yes, No, Unknown.
- Specific questioning related to disease surveillance.

The semantics of this archetype are intentionally loose, and querying this archetype would normally only be useful or safe within the context of each specific template. In a template, each data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. Where value sets have been proposed for common use cases, these can be adapted for local use by using the 'text' choice to match each specific use case.

In use cases where it's important to differentiate the time context of a question in the persisted data, the reference model EVENT structure can be used to record this difference. For questions specifically about the point in time of recording, use a point in time EVENT, for example "Do you have influenza?". In contrast, for questions specifically about a period of time, use the interval event, for example, "Have you had influenza in the past 4 weeks?".

The source of the information in a questionnaire response may vary in different contexts but can be specifically identified using the 'Information provider' element in the Reference Model.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening questionnaire identifies the presence of a problem or diagnosis, it is recommended that clinical system record and persist the specific details about the problem or diagnosis (such as the date of clinical recognition) using the EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis archetype. (en)
de.misuse:
*Not to be used to record details about the presence or absence of a problem or diagnosis, outside of a screening context. Use EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis or EVALUATION.exclusion_specific for these purposes.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about issues, worries or concerns affecting an individual. Use OBSERVATION.issue_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about procedures performed. Use the OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about adverse reactions, use OBESERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for this purpose. (en)

nb.purpose: For å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om problemer eller diagnoser.
nb.use:
Brukes for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om problemer eller diagnoser.

Vanlige bruksområder inkluderer, men er ikke begrenset til:
- Systematiske spørsmål ved konsultasjoner, for eksempel:
--- Diagnostisert med kreft? Ja, Nei, Ukjent.
--- Diagnostisert med Covid 19 eller influensa de siste tolv månedene? Ja, Nei, Ukjent.
- Spesifikke spørsmål relatert til overvåkning av sykdommer.

Semantikken til denne arketypen er med vilje løst definert, og spørringer etter data i denne arketypen vil normalt bare være nyttig eller trygt innenfor konteksten av hvert spesifikke templat. I et templat vil hvert dataelement vanligvis døpes om til det spesifikke spørsmålet. Der det er foreslått verdisett for vanlige brukstilfeller, kan disse tilpasses for lokal bruk ved å bruke 'tekst'-datatypen for å matche hvert enkelt brukstilfelle.

I tilfeller der det er viktig å skille tid i konteksten av spørsmål i de persisterte dataene, kan referansemodellens EVENT-struktur brukes for å registrere denne variasjonen. For spørsmål som spesifikt handler om tidspunktet ved registrering, bruk tidspunkt (point in time) EVENT. For eksempel: "Har du influensa?". Spørsmål som spesifikt omhandler en tidsperiode, bruk et intervall (interval) EVENT. For eksempel: "Har du hatt influensa de siste 4 ukene?".

Kilden til informasjonen i et spørreskjema kan variere i ulike kontekster, men kan identifiseres spesifikt ved å benytte "Information provider" elementet i openEHR referansemodellen.

Denne arketypen er laget for å bli brukt i et spørreskjema eller for å registrere enkle strukturerte data til for eksempel et sykdomsregister. Dersom det i spørreskjemaet identifiseres at et problem eller en diagnose er tilstede, anbefales det at det at spesifikke detaljer om problemet eller diagnosen (som for eksempel dato for klinisk bekreftelse) registreres og lagres i pasientjournalen i arketypen Problem/diagnose (EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis).
nb.misuse:
Brukes ikke for å registrere detaljer om tilstedeværelse eller fravær av et problem eller en diagnose utenfor konteksten av kartleggingen. Bruk arketypen EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis eller EVALUATION.exclusion_specific for dette formålet.

Brukes ikke for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om bekymringer eller forhold som gjelder et individ. Bruk arketypen OBSERVATION.issue_screening for dette formålet.

Brukes ikke for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om gjennomførte prosedyrer, bruk arketypen OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for dette formålet.

Brukes ikke for å lage et rammeverk for registrering av svar på forhåndsdefinerte spørsmål om overfølsomhetsreaksjoner, bruk arketypen OBSERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for dette formålet.

en.purpose: To create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.
en.use:
Use to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation, for example:
--- Diagnosed with cancer? Yes, No, Unknown.
--- Diagnosed with COVID 19 or Influenza in the past twelve months? Yes, No, Unknown.
- Specific questioning related to disease surveillance.

The semantics of this archetype are intentionally loose, and querying this archetype would normally only be useful or safe within the context of each specific template. In a template, each data element would usually be renamed to the specific question asked. Where value sets have been proposed for common use cases, these can be adapted for local use by using the 'text' choice to match each specific use case.

In use cases where it's important to differentiate the time context of a question in the persisted data, the reference model EVENT structure can be used to record this difference. For questions specifically about the point in time of recording, use a point in time EVENT, for example "Do you have influenza?". In contrast, for questions specifically about a period of time, use the interval event, for example, "Have you had influenza in the past 4 weeks?".

The source of the information in a questionnaire response may vary in different contexts but can be specifically identified using the 'Information provider' element in the Reference Model.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening questionnaire identifies the presence of a problem or diagnosis, it is recommended that clinical system record and persist the specific details about the problem or diagnosis (such as the date of clinical recognition) using the EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis archetype.
en.misuse:
Not to be used to record details about the presence or absence of a problem or diagnosis, outside of a screening context. Use EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis or EVALUATION.exclusion_specific for these purposes.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about issues, worries or concerns affecting an individual. Use OBSERVATION.issue_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about procedures performed. Use the OBSERVATION.procedure_screening for this purpose.

Not to be used to to create a framework for recording answers to pre-defined screening questions about adverse reactions, use OBSERVATION.adverse_reaction_screening for this purpose.

at0000.1.description: Answers to pre-defined screening questions about problems or diagnoses.

at0028.1.text: Saya rutin periksa mata ke dokter mata paling tidak 1 taun sekali sesuai dengan anjuran dokter atau perawat
at0028.1.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.2.text: Saya rutin memeriksakan mata saya paling tidak 1 tahun sekali dengan kesadaran sendiri karena saya tahu hal ini sangat penting
at0028.2.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.3.text: Walaupun pengelihatan saya baik-baik saja, saya tetap memeiksakan mata saya ke dokter mata paling tidak 1 tahun sekali karena saya tahu saya berisiko terkena gangguan pengelihatan
at0028.3.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.4.text: Saya tidak memeriksakan mata saya karena saya merasa tidak perlu melakukannya
at0028.4.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.5.text: Saya aktif mencari tahu bagaimana cara mencegah gangguan pengelihatan pada penderita diabetes baik itu bertanya kepada dokter, perawat, membaca buku, internet, dll
at0028.5.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.6.text: Saya tidak mencari tahu bagaimana cara mencegah gangguan pengelihatan karena saya merasa tidak memerlukannya
at0028.6.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.7.text: Saya membatasi konsumsi gula & karbohidrat (nasi, roti, mie, kentang, singkong, dll), untuk mengontrol gula darah saya sesuai dengan surat dokter atau perawat
at0028.7.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.8.text: Selain mengatur asupan makanan, saya juga aktif melakukan olah raga seperti jalan kaki, senam, lari kecil, berkebun, dll untuk mengontrol kadar gula darah
at0028.8.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.9.text: Untuk menjaga kadar gula darah tetap terkontrol, saya menggunakan insulin atau obat yang diresepkan oleh dokter
at0028.9.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.10.text: Saya senantiasa menjaga tekanan darah tidak melebihi 130/80 mmHg dengan cara menurunkan berat badan, mengurangi konsumsi garam, meningkatkan aktivitas fisik, menghentikan merokok dan alkohol, dan dengan mengkonsumsi obat anti darah tinggi
at0028.10.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.11.text: Saya senantiasa mengontrol kadar lemak saya dengan cara mengurangi asupan makanan seperti kuning telur, otak, jeroan, lemak, mentega, keju, dll serta dengan meningkatkan aktivitas fisik
at0028.11.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.12.text: Saya rutin periksa kadar gula darah untuk mengetahui status kesehatan dan keberhasilan upaya yang saya lakukan baik ke puskesmas, klinik, maupun ke rumah sakit
at0028.12.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.13.text: Saya rutin periksa kadar lemak untuk mengetahui status kesehatan dan keberhasilan upaya yang saya lakukan baik ke puskesmas, klinik, maupun ke rumah sakit
at0028.13.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.

at0028.14.text: Saya rutin periksa tekanan darah untuk mengetahui status kesehatan dan keberhasilan upaya yang saya lakukan baik ke puskesmas, klinik, maupun ke rumah sakit
at0028.14.description: Presence of problems or diagnoses related to the screening purpose.
